alert.note: Alert for Lake; Lincoln; McCook; Minnehaha; Turner (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Sioux Falls (Southeastern SD, Southwestern MN, and Northwestern IA)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 30 at 4:51PM MDT until May 30 at 5:15PM MDT by NWS Sioux Falls
info.description: The National Weather Service in Sioux Falls has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southern Lake County in east central South Dakota... Minnehaha County in southeastern South Dakota... Northwestern Lincoln County in southeastern South Dakota... Eastern McCook County in southeastern South Dakota... Northeastern Turner County in southeastern South Dakota... * Until 615 PM CDT. * At 551 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from Humboldt to near Hartford to near Wall Lake, moving northeast at 65 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Severe thunderstorms will be near... Ellis around 555 PM CDT. Sioux Falls, Crooks and Lyons around 600 PM CDT. Baltic, Colton and Renner around 605 PM CDT. Dell Rapids and Palisades State Park around 610 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of these severe thunderstorms include Garretson and Sherman. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
